parameters.query:
SELECT prediction_id, predicted_winner, confidence_score
  FROM predictions
  WHERE player1 = '{{ $json.player1 }}'
    AND player2 = '{{ $json.player2 }}'
    AND tournament = '{{ $json.tournament }}'
  LIMIT 1;

UPDATE predictions
  SET
    actual_winner = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}',
    prediction_correct = (predicted_winner = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}')
  WHERE prediction_id = {{ $("Find Matching Prediction").item.json.prediction_id }}
  RETURNING
    prediction_id,
    predicted_winner,
    actual_winner,
    prediction_correct,
    confidence_score,
    tournament,
    surface,
    player1,
    player2,
    odds_player1,
    odds_player2,
    '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.match_date }}'::date as match_date;

INSERT INTO matches (
  match_unique_id,
  tournament,
  country,
  surface,
  player1,
  player1_nationality,
  player2,
  player2_nationality,
  odds_player1,
  odds_player2,
  winner,
  loser,
  score,
  match_date,
  is_upset,
  odds_winner,
  odds_loser,
  implied_prob_player1,    -- ADD THIS
  implied_prob_player2,    -- ADD THIS
  favorite,                 -- ADD THIS
  favorite_won              -- ADD THIS
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.tournament }}_{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}_{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player2 }}_{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.match_date }}',
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.tournament }}',
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.country }}',
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.surface }}',
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}',
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1_nationality }}',
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player2 }}',
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player2_nationality }}',
  {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds1 }},
  {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds2 }},
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}',
  (CASE
    WHEN '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}' = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}'
      THEN '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player2 }}'
    ELSE '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}'
  END),
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.score }}',
  '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.match_date }}'::date,
  (CASE
    WHEN {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds1 }} < {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds2 }}
      THEN '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}' != '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}'
    ELSE '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}' != '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player2 }}'
  END),
  (CASE
    WHEN '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}' = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}'
      THEN {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds1 }}
    ELSE {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds2 }}
  END),
  (CASE
    WHEN '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}' = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}'
      THEN {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds2 }}
    ELSE {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds1 }}
  END),
  ROUND((1.0 / {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds1 }}) * 100, 2),  -- ADD: implied_prob_player1
  ROUND((1.0 / {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds2 }}) * 100, 2),  -- ADD: implied_prob_player2
  (CASE  -- ADD: favorite
    WHEN {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds1 }} < {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds2 }}
      THEN '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}'
    ELSE '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player2 }}'
  END),
  (CASE  -- ADD: favorite_won
    WHEN {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds1 }} < {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.odds2 }}
      THEN '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}' = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}'
    ELSE '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.winner }}' = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player2 }}'
  END)
)
ON CONFLICT (match_unique_id) DO UPDATE SET
  winner = EXCLUDED.winner,
  loser = EXCLUDED.loser,
  score = EXCLUDED.score,
  is_upset = EXCLUDED.is_upset,
  odds_winner = EXCLUDED.odds_winner,
  odds_loser = EXCLUDED.odds_loser,
  implied_prob_player1 = EXCLUDED.implied_prob_player1,     -- ADD THIS
  implied_prob_player2 = EXCLUDED.implied_prob_player2,     -- ADD THIS
  favorite = EXCLUDED.favorite,                              -- ADD THIS
  favorite_won = EXCLUDED.favorite_won;                      -- ADD THIS

WITH stats AS (
  SELECT
    COUNT(*) as total_preds,
    SUM(CASE WHEN prediction_correct = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as correct_preds,
    SUM(CASE WHEN prediction_correct = false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as incorrect_preds,
    AVG(CASE WHEN prediction_correct = true THEN confidence_score ELSE NULL END) as avg_conf_correct,
    AVG(CASE WHEN prediction_correct = false THEN confidence_score ELSE NULL END) as avg_conf_incorrect,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN confidence_score >= 60 AND prediction_correct = true THEN 1 END) as high_conf_correct,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN confidence_score >= 60 THEN 1 END) as high_conf_total,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN confidence_score >= 50 AND confidence_score < 60 AND prediction_correct = true THEN 1 END) as med_conf_correct,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN confidence_score >= 50 AND confidence_score < 60 THEN 1 END) as med_conf_total,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN confidence_score < 50 AND prediction_correct = true THEN 1 END) as low_conf_correct,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN confidence_score < 50 THEN 1 END) as low_conf_total
  FROM predictions
  WHERE actual_winner IS NOT NULL
),
pinecone_count AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM matches
)
UPDATE system_metadata
SET
  days_operated = days_operated + 1,
  total_matches_processed = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches),
  total_predictions_made = (SELECT total_preds FROM stats),
  correct_predictions = (SELECT correct_preds FROM stats),
  incorrect_predictions = (SELECT incorrect_preds FROM stats),
  overall_accuracy = ROUND((SELECT correct_preds::numeric / NULLIF(total_preds, 0) * 100 FROM stats), 2),
  avg_confidence_when_correct = ROUND((SELECT avg_conf_correct FROM stats), 2),
  avg_confidence_when_incorrect = ROUND((SELECT avg_conf_incorrect FROM stats), 2),
  accuracy_high_confidence = ROUND((SELECT high_conf_correct::numeric / NULLIF(high_conf_total, 0) * 100 FROM stats), 2),
  accuracy_medium_confidence = ROUND((SELECT med_conf_correct::numeric / NULLIF(med_conf_total, 0) * 100 FROM stats), 2),
  accuracy_low_confidence = ROUND((SELECT low_conf_correct::numeric / NULLIF(low_conf_total, 0) * 100 FROM stats), 2),
  pinecone_record_count = (SELECT total FROM pinecone_count),
  learning_phase = CASE
    WHEN days_operated + 1 < 8 THEN 'phase1_data_collection'
    WHEN days_operated + 1 < 22 THEN 'phase2_pattern_recognition'
    ELSE 'phase3_mature_system'
  END,
  last_update = NOW(),
  last_result_date = CURRENT_DATE
WHERE id = 1
RETURNING days_operated, learning_phase, overall_accuracy, pinecone_record_count;

INSERT INTO prediction_accuracy (
    date,
    total_predictions,
    correct_predictions,
    incorrect_predictions,
    daily_accuracy,
    high_conf_predictions,
    high_conf_correct,
    high_conf_accuracy,
    medium_conf_predictions,
    medium_conf_correct,
    medium_conf_accuracy,
    low_conf_predictions,
    low_conf_correct,
    low_conf_accuracy,
    learning_phase
  )
  VALUES (
    CURRENT_DATE,
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.total_predictions }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.correct_predictions }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.incorrect_predictions }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.accuracy_percentage }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.high_confidence.total }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.high_confidence.correct }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.high_confidence.accuracy }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.medium_confidence.total }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.medium_confidence.correct }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.medium_confidence.accuracy }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.low_confidence.total }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.low_confidence.correct }},
    {{ $('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json.low_confidence.accuracy }},
    (SELECT learning_phase FROM system_metadata WHERE id = 1)
  )
  ON CONFLICT (date) DO UPDATE SET
    total_predictions = EXCLUDED.total_predictions,
    correct_predictions = EXCLUDED.correct_predictions,
    incorrect_predictions = EXCLUDED.incorrect_predictions,
    daily_accuracy = EXCLUDED.daily_accuracy,
    high_conf_predictions = EXCLUDED.high_conf_predictions,
    high_conf_correct = EXCLUDED.high_conf_correct,
    high_conf_accuracy = EXCLUDED.high_conf_accuracy,
    medium_conf_predictions = EXCLUDED.medium_conf_predictions,
    medium_conf_correct = EXCLUDED.medium_conf_correct,
    medium_conf_accuracy = EXCLUDED.medium_conf_accuracy,
    low_conf_predictions = EXCLUDED.low_conf_predictions,
    low_conf_correct = EXCLUDED.low_conf_correct,
    low_conf_accuracy = EXCLUDED.low_conf_accuracy,
    learning_phase = EXCLUDED.learning_phase;

SELECT
    p.prediction_id,
    p.tournament,
    p.surface,
    p.player1,
    p.player2,
    p.predicted_winner,
    p.actual_winner,
    p.confidence_score,
    p.reasoning,
    p.odds_player1,
    p.odds_player2,
    p.days_operated,
    p.data_quality_score,
    p.player1_data_available,
    p.player2_data_available,

    -- Add match result data
    m.score,
    m.is_upset,
    m.odds_winner,
    m.odds_loser,

    -- Player 1 stats (can be NULL for new players)
    pl1.total_matches as player1_total_matches,
    pl1.win_rate_overall as player1_win_rate,
    pl1.win_rate_clay as player1_win_rate_clay,
    pl1.win_rate_hard as player1_win_rate_hard,
    pl1.win_rate_grass as player1_win_rate_grass,
    pl1.giant_killer_score as player1_giant_killer_score,
    pl1.vs_favorites_win_rate as player1_vs_favorites_rate,
    pl1.recent_form_last_5 as player1_recent_form,
    pl1.momentum_score as player1_momentum,

    -- Player 2 stats (can be NULL for new players)
    pl2.total_matches as player2_total_matches,
    pl2.win_rate_overall as player2_win_rate,
    pl2.win_rate_clay as player2_win_rate_clay,
    pl2.win_rate_hard as player2_win_rate_hard,
    pl2.win_rate_grass as player2_win_rate_grass,
    pl2.giant_killer_score as player2_giant_killer_score,
    pl2.vs_favorites_win_rate as player2_vs_favorites_rate,
    pl2.recent_form_last_5 as player2_recent_form,
    pl2.momentum_score as player2_momentum

  FROM predictions p
  LEFT JOIN players pl1 ON pl1.player_name = p.player1
  LEFT JOIN players pl2 ON pl2.player_name = p.player2
  LEFT JOIN matches m ON m.prediction_id = p.prediction_id
  WHERE p.prediction_correct = false
    AND p.prediction_date = '{{ $('Extract mathces').first().json.match_date }}'
  ORDER BY p.confidence_score DESC;

values.content:
=  Analyze today's failed predictions and identify learning opportunities.

  Failed Predictions (with player stats and match results):
  {{ JSON.stringify($('Get Failed Predictions').all().map(item => item.json), null, 2) }}

  Daily Stats:
  {{ JSON.stringify($('Calculate Daily Stats').item.json, null, 2) }}

  IMPORTANT: You have access to BOTH historical player stats AND today's match results.

  PLAYER STATISTICS (may be NULL for new players):
  - total_matches: Number of historical matches (NULL = new player)
  - win_rate_*: Win rates by surface
  - giant_killer_score: Ability to beat favorites (0-10 scale)
  - vs_favorites_win_rate: Win rate when underdog
  - recent_form: Last 5 matches (e.g., "WWLWL")
  - momentum_score: Recent performance (0-10 scale)

  MATCH RESULT DATA:
  - score: Match score (e.g., "6-1 6-1", "7-6 6-4")
  - is_upset: Whether this was an upset win
  - odds_winner/odds_loser: Actual odds for winner/loser

  ---

  SYSTEM-LEVEL PATTERNS (affect multiple matches):
  These go in "patterns_discovered" - DO NOT mention specific player names:
  - Odds bias (e.g., "System overweights favorites 1.30-1.80")
  - Data quality issues (e.g., "Fails when both players <5 matches")
  - Surface patterns (e.g., "Indoor hard qualifiers volatile")

  PLAYER-SPECIFIC INSIGHTS (individual player behaviors):
  These go in "player_specific_insights" - use EXACT player names from data:

  **PATTERN-BASED insights** (require 10+ matches):
  - surface_specialist: 80%+ win rate on specific surface with 15+ matches
  - giant_killer: giant_killer_score > 5 with multiple upset wins
  - momentum_rising: momentum_score > 7 with recent win streak

  **EVENT-BASED insights** (can be from single match):
  - upset_winner: Won as underdog today (check is_upset = true)
  - dominant_performance: Crushed opponent with score like "6-0 6-1", "6-1 6-1", "6-2 6-0"
  - even_odds_dominance: Close odds (1.50-2.00 range both) but dominant score
  - emerging_threat: New player (total_matches < 5 or NULL) with strong win
  - form_concern: Player lost badly (reverse of dominant_performance)

  **RULES FOR EVENT-BASED INSIGHTS:**
  1. Upset winner: is_upset = true AND player won
  2. Dominant score: Score shows 2+ set differential OR sets won 6-0, 6-1, or 6-2
  3. Even odds dominance: Both odds 1.50-2.00 AND dominant score
  4. Emerging threat: total_matches NULL or < 5 AND player won
  5. Form concern: Lost badly with dominant score against them

  **OUTPUT FORMAT:**

  Respond with JSON in this exact format:
  {
    "summary": "Brief 2-3 sentence summary of today's performance",
    "key_failures": [
      {
        "prediction_id": 123,
        "failure_reason": "Why this prediction failed",
        "learning": "What we learned",
        "impact_score": 8
      }
    ],
    "patterns_discovered": [
      {
        "pattern_type": "odds_bias | other",
        "description": "SYSTEM-LEVEL pattern (no player names)",
        "affected_predictions": [123, 456],
        "recommendation": "How to adjust the system"
      }
    ],
    "player_specific_insights": [
      {
        "player_name": "Exact player name from data",
        "insight_type": "surface_specialist | giant_killer | momentum_rising | upset_winner | dominant_performance | even_odds_dominance | emerging_threat |
  form_concern",
        "description": "Brief insight (max 100 chars) - include score if relevant",
        "confidence": 60-90,
        "affected_predictions": [123],
        "recommendation": "How to adjust for THIS player",
        "supporting_data": {
          "score": "6-1 6-1",
          "was_upset": true,
          "odds": 2.50,
          "historical_matches": 15
        }
      }
    ],
    "confidence_calibration": {
      "high_confidence_analysis": "Analysis of 60%+ confidence predictions",
      "recommended_adjustment": "Increase/Decrease confidence by X%"
    },
    "action_items": [
      "Specific actionable improvements"
    ]
  }

  **IMPORTANT:**
  - Create player insights even for players with no historical data (NULL stats)
  - Use match score to detect dominant performances
  - Check is_upset flag to identify upset winners
  - Include score in supporting_data when relevant
  - Set confidence lower (60-70) for event-based insights vs pattern-based (75-90)
You are an expert tennis prediction analyst. Analyze failed predictions to identify patterns, systematic errors, and improvement opportunities. Always respond with valid JSON only.

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO learning_log (
  log_date,
  learning_type,
  description,
  related_prediction_id,
  learning_data,
  impact_score,
  action_taken
)
VALUES (
  CURRENT_DATE,
  '{{ $json.log_type }}',
  '{{ $json.description }}',
  {{ $json.related_prediction_id || 'NULL' }},
  '{{ $json.learning_data }}'::jsonb,
  {{ $json.impact_score }},
  'stored_for_analysis'
);

UPDATE matches m
SET prediction_id = p.prediction_id
FROM predictions p
WHERE m.player1 = p.player1
  AND m.player2 = p.player2
  AND m.tournament = p.tournament
  AND m.match_date = CURRENT_DATE
  AND m.prediction_id IS NULL
RETURNING m.match_unique_id, m.prediction_id;

INSERT INTO player_insights (
    player_name,
    insight_type,
    insight_description,
    confidence,
    supporting_data,
    discovered_date,
    is_active
  )
  VALUES (
    '{{ $json.player_name }}',
    '{{ $json.insight_type }}',
    '{{ $json.insight_description }}',
    {{ $json.confidence }},
    '{{ $json.supporting_data }}'::jsonb,
    '{{ $json.discovered_date }}',
    true
  )
  ON CONFLICT (player_name, insight_type)
  DO UPDATE SET
    insight_description = EXCLUDED.insight_description,
    confidence = EXCLUDED.confidence,
    supporting_data = EXCLUDED.supporting_data,
    discovered_date = EXCLUDED.discovered_date,
    last_validated = CURRENT_DATE,
    updated_at = NOW();

-- Update player statistics for both players in the match
  WITH match_data AS (
    SELECT
      player1,
      player2,
      winner,
      surface,
      odds_player1,
      odds_player2,
      match_date,
      is_upset,
      favorite
    FROM matches
    WHERE tournament = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.tournament }}'
      AND player1 = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1 }}'
      AND player2 = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player2 }}'
      AND match_date = '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.match_date }}'
    LIMIT 1
  ),
  player1_update AS (
    INSERT INTO players (player_name, nationality, first_seen_date)
    VALUES (
      (SELECT player1 FROM match_data),
      '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player1_nationality }}',
      CURRENT_DATE
    )
    ON CONFLICT (player_name) DO NOTHING
    RETURNING player_name
  ),
  player2_update AS (
    INSERT INTO players (player_name, nationality, first_seen_date)
    VALUES (
      (SELECT player2 FROM match_data),
      '{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.player2_nationality }}',
      CURRENT_DATE
    )
    ON CONFLICT (player_name) DO NOTHING
    RETURNING player_name
  )
  -- Update Player 1 stats
  UPDATE players p
  SET
    total_matches = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name
    ),
    total_wins = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE m.winner = p.player_name
    ),
    total_losses = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
      AND m.winner != p.player_name
    ),
    win_rate_overall = ROUND(
      (SELECT COUNT(*)::numeric FROM matches m WHERE m.winner = p.player_name) /
      NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m WHERE m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name), 0) * 100,
      2
    ),
    matches_clay = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
      AND m.surface = 'Clay'
    ),
    matches_hard = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
      AND m.surface = 'Hard'
    ),
    matches_grass = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
      AND m.surface = 'Grass'
    ),
    win_rate_clay = ROUND(
      (SELECT COUNT(*)::numeric FROM matches m WHERE m.winner = p.player_name AND m.surface = 'Clay') /
      NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name) AND m.surface = 'Clay'), 0) * 100,
      2
    ),
    win_rate_hard = ROUND(
      (SELECT COUNT(*)::numeric FROM matches m WHERE m.winner = p.player_name AND m.surface = 'Hard') /
      NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name) AND m.surface = 'Hard'), 0) * 100,
      2
    ),
    win_rate_grass = ROUND(
      (SELECT COUNT(*)::numeric FROM matches m WHERE m.winner = p.player_name AND m.surface = 'Grass') /
      NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name) AND m.surface = 'Grass'), 0) * 100,
      2
    ),
    upset_wins_count = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE m.winner = p.player_name AND m.is_upset = true
    ),
    upset_losses_count = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
      AND m.winner != p.player_name AND m.is_upset = true
    ),
    favorite_wins_count = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE m.winner = p.player_name AND m.favorite = p.player_name
    ),
    favorite_losses_count = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
      WHERE m.favorite = p.player_name AND m.winner != p.player_name
    ),
    giant_killer_score = ROUND(
      (SELECT COUNT(*)::numeric FROM matches m WHERE m.winner = p.player_name AND m.is_upset = true) * 10.0 /
      NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m WHERE m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name), 0),
      2
    ),
    avg_odds_when_winning = ROUND(
      (SELECT AVG(CASE
        WHEN m.winner = m.player1 AND p.player_name = m.player1 THEN m.odds_player1
        WHEN m.winner = m.player2 AND p.player_name = m.player2 THEN m.odds_player2
      END) FROM matches m WHERE m.winner = p.player_name),
      2
    ),
    avg_odds_when_losing = ROUND(
      (SELECT AVG(CASE
        WHEN m.winner != m.player1 AND p.player_name = m.player1 THEN m.odds_player1
        WHEN m.winner != m.player2 AND p.player_name = m.player2 THEN m.odds_player2
      END) FROM matches m WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name) AND m.winner != p.player_name),
      2
    ),
    vs_favorites_win_rate = ROUND(
      (SELECT COUNT(*)::numeric FROM matches m
       WHERE m.winner = p.player_name
       AND m.favorite != p.player_name) /
      NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
              WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
              AND m.favorite != p.player_name), 0) * 100,
      2
    ),
    vs_underdogs_win_rate = ROUND(
      (SELECT COUNT(*)::numeric FROM matches m
       WHERE m.winner = p.player_name
       AND m.favorite = p.player_name) /
      NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM matches m
              WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
              AND m.favorite = p.player_name), 0) * 100,
      2
    ),
    recent_form_last_5 = (
      SELECT STRING_AGG(
        CASE WHEN m.winner = p.player_name THEN 'W' ELSE 'L' END,
        ''
        ORDER BY m.match_date DESC
      )
      FROM (
        SELECT * FROM matches m
        WHERE m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name
        ORDER BY m.match_date DESC
        LIMIT 5
      ) m
    ),
    recent_form_last_10 = (
      SELECT STRING_AGG(
        CASE WHEN m.winner = p.player_name THEN 'W' ELSE 'L' END,
        ''
        ORDER BY m.match_date DESC
      )
      FROM (
        SELECT * FROM matches m
        WHERE m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name
        ORDER BY m.match_date DESC
        LIMIT 10
      ) m
    ),
    wins_last_5 = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
        SELECT * FROM matches m
        WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
        ORDER BY m.match_date DESC
        LIMIT 5
      ) m WHERE m.winner = p.player_name
    ),
    wins_last_10 = (
      SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
        SELECT * FROM matches m
        WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
        ORDER BY m.match_date DESC
        LIMIT 10
      ) m WHERE m.winner = p.player_name
    ),
    momentum_score = ROUND(
      (SELECT COUNT(*)::numeric FROM (
        SELECT * FROM matches m
        WHERE (m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name)
        ORDER BY m.match_date DESC
        LIMIT 5
      ) m WHERE m.winner = p.player_name) * 2.0,
      2
    ),
    last_match_date = (
      SELECT MAX(m.match_date) FROM matches m
      WHERE m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name
    ),
    total_tournaments = (
      SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT m.tournament) FROM matches m
      WHERE m.player1 = p.player_name OR m.player2 = p.player_name
    ),
    last_updated = NOW()
  WHERE p.player_name IN (
    SELECT player1 FROM match_data
    UNION
    SELECT player2 FROM match_data
  )
  RETURNING player_name, total_matches, total_wins, win_rate_overall;
